name: Blind Eastwood
description:
Play as Clint Eastwood in a stealth game emulating the difficulties of blindness.

In Vietnam he lost his sight. Now he works at a bank, and some punks decided to rob it at the wrong time.

You will have a few coins to distract the robbers, your trusty stick to knock them out, and many hostages who need rescue.

Use your left click to distract the guards with your coins, your right click to hit them with the stick, and your Shift button to slowly walk and avoid the robbers

Game developed in 48h in the GamesUPM Game Jam.

Update: two difficulty modes (easy and original mode), new menu and credits
